bltdddf25a3c38ebe74.title: DNA.
bltdddf25a3c38ebe74.description: "DNA" (stylized as "DNA.") is a song by American rapper Kendrick Lamar from his fourth studio album Damn. Despite not being released as a single, the song received support at rhythmic radio after its official music video was released. The second track on the album (thirteenth on the Collector's Edition of Damn), it was written by Lamar, while the production was handled by Mike Will Made It.
bltdddf25a3c38ebe74.lyrics:
[Intro: Geraldo Rivera & Kendrick Lamar]
This is why I say that hip-hop has done more damage to young African Americans than racism in recent years
I got, I got, I got, I got—
Loyalty, got royalty inside my DNA
Cocaine quarter piece, got war and peace inside my DNA
I got power, poison, pain and joy inside my DNA
I got hustle though, ambition, flow inside my DNA
I was born like this, since one like this, immaculate conception
I transform like this, perform like this, was Yeshua's new weapon
I don't contemplate, I meditate, then off your f***in' head
This that put-the-kids-to-bed
This that I got, I got, I got, I got—
Realness, I just kill s*** 'cause it's in my DNA
I got millions, I got riches buildin' in my DNA
I got dark, I got evil that rot inside my DNA
I got off, I got troublesome, heart inside my DNA
I just win again, then win again like Wimbledon, I serve
Yeah, that's him again, the sound of the engine is a blur
You see, murder on the news again
Then see Compton, you see me is a blur
I got loyalty, got royalty inside my DNA
(I got, I got, I got, I got)

[Verse 1]
Look, I was born like this, pedigree on another level
F*** your pedigree, f*** your pedigree
And I got seniority, 'cause I'm a carrier
F*** your heritage, paranoid and inherited
The wind is tellin' me you're a b**** a**, a b**** a**
D-N-A, a b**** a**, a b**** a**
You ain't s*** without a body on your belt
You ain't s*** without a ticket on your plate
You ain't sick enough to pull it on yourself
You ain't rich enough to hit the lot and skate
Tell me when destruction gonna be my fate
Gonna be your fate, gonna be our faith
Peace to the world, let it rotate
Sex, money, murder—our DNA

[Bridge]
I know my creator, I'm a believer
I know my karma, I'm a deceiver
I know my enemy, I'm a survivor
I know my spirit, I'm a believer
I know my enemy, I'm a believer
I know my karma, I'm a survivor
I know my creator, I'm a deceiver
I know my enemy, I know my karma

[Verse 2]
DNA
I was born like this
Since day one like this
Immaculate conception
I was born like this
Since day one like this
With a heart full of terror, a soul full of race
I know murder, conviction
Burners, boosters, burglars, ballers, dead, redemption
Scholars, fathers dead with kids
And I know depreciation, dollars, hospital bed, a rival, dead, a suicidal weakness
I was born like this, since one like this
With a heart full of terror, a soul full of race
You's a b****, your hormones prolly switch inside your DNA
Problem is, all that sucker s*** inside your DNA
Daddy prolly snitched, heritage inside your DNA
Backbone don't exist, born outside a jellyfish, I gauge
See, my pedigree is a whole 'nother breed
And you's a motherf***in' b****
I got my finger on the mothaf***in' trigger
And I'ma tell you everything and I'ma say it with a passion
I grew up in a project, roaches and rats
Dope, needles, and pins, I've been in it since an infant
Life ain't nothin' but a b**** on the rag, I'm the rags-to-riches
N----, I'm the one, you can't be like this, n----
N----, I'm the one, I said I'm the one
A-1, every day, G-O-D, I am the one
So you can't be like this, n----
I'm a savage, I'm an a**, I'm a king
I'm a stunt, I'm a god, I'm a n----, a b****
I'm a f**, I'm a thug, I'm a nerd, I'm a b****
I'm whatever you say I am
If I wasn't, then why would I say I am?
In the paper, the news, every day I am
Radio won't play this, they know I'm not a fa-a-ake
That's my DNA, I'm not a fa-a-ake
Don't you tell me what you think of me
I'm a god, I'm a king, I'm a giant
You's a b****, you a dub, you a puppet
See, my DNA is not for imitation
Your DNA an abomination
This how it is when you're in the Matrix
Dodgin' bullets, reapin' what you sow
And stackin' up the footage, livin' on the go
And sleepin' in a villa
Sippin' from a Grammy, and walkin' in the buildin'
Diamond in the ceilin', marble on the floors
Beach inside the window, peekin' out the window
Baby in the pool, godfather with the tool
I don't need a witness, I'ma live in secret
I'ma die with secrets, my DNA is deep
And I don't give a f*** and I ain't in the streets
And I ain't on the ‘Gram, and I ain't on the beat
I'm a good man with some bad habits
I'm a sober man with some bad habits
I'm a high man with some bad habits
I'm a proud man with some bad habits
And my DNA is not for imitation
Your DNA an abomination
This how it is when you in the Matrix
Yah!

[Outro: Rick James]
Mary-Anne, ha, ha, ha, ha

blt428dde435b0510aa.title: ELEMENT.
blt428dde435b0510aa.description: "Element" (stylized as "ELEMENT.") is a song by American rapper Kendrick Lamar, from his fourth studio album Damn, released on April 14, 2017. The fourth track on the album (eleventh on the Collector's Edition of Damn), the song was written by Lamar, Sounwave, James Blake, and Ricci Riera and produced by Sounwave, Blake, and Riera, with additional production by Tae Beast and Bēkon. The song charted in multiple countries in 2017.

This is my world

[Verse 2: Kendrick Lamar & Kid Capri]

I don't give a, I don't give a, I don't give a f***

bltdd64cdd045876815.title: HUMBLE.
bltdd64cdd045876815.description: "Humble" (stylized as "HUMBLE.") is a song by American rapper Kendrick Lamar. It was released on March 30, 2017, along with its music video, by Top Dawg Entertainment, Aftermath Entertainment and Interscope Records. The song was written by Lamar and producers Mike Will Made It and Pluss. The lyrics are a call to humility. It was provided to rhythmic contemporary radio as the lead single from Lamar's fourth studio album, Damn.
bltdd64cdd045876815.lyrics:

Nobody pray for me

Ayy, I remember syrup sandwiches and crime allowances

bltf416828f88dcb178.title: Shelter
bltf416828f88dcb178.description: "Shelter" is a song by American DJ and record producer Porter Robinson and French DJ and record producer Madeon, released as a single on August 11, 2016. In October 2016, a music video, produced in collaboration with A-1 Pictures, was released.
bltf416828f88dcb178.lyrics:
I could never find the right way to tell you
Have you noticed I've been gone?
'Cause I left behind the home that you made me
But I will carry it along

And it's a long way forward, so trust in me
I'll give them shelter like you've done for me
And I know, I'm not alone, you'll be watching over us
Until you're gone

When I'm older, I'll be silent beside you
I know words won't be enough
And they won't need to know our names or our faces
But they will carry on for us

And it's a long way forward, so trust in me
I'll give them shelter like you've done for me
And I know, I'm not alone, you'll be watching over us
Until you're gone

Oh, it's a long way forward, trust in me
I'll give them shelter like you've done for me
And I know, I'm not alone, you'll be watching over us
Until...
